name: ThebenLUXORliving
0:
”Alexa, switch off the ceiling light.”
”Alexa, dim ceiling light to 50%.”
”Alexa, turn on scene TV.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Requirements:

• The Theben LUXORliving system must be ready for use.
• You need an activated user account at cloud.theben.de
• The system center LUXORliving IP1 must be connected to Theben Cloud.
• Required firmware version of the system center LUXORliving IP1: 1.3.x or higher.

Installation:
1. If not already done, connect your LUXORliving system to Theben Cloud.
2. Activate Theben LUXORliving skill in the Amazon Alexa app.
3. When activating the skill, enter your email address and password for your cloud.theben.de user account.
4. Then enter the user name and password of the desired user of your IP1.
5. Click "Find my devices". You will receive all devices that were found in your LUXORliving system.
6. Done! The skill is now set up. Have fun!
The current firmware and detailed instructions with further tips can be found at:https://www.luxorliving.de/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Systemhandbuch-LUXORliving_Version-3_EN.pdf
